attributes.action: take the country to war with Iran unless the missing 15 servicemen are returned immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Iran have acted aggressively towards our country by taking 15 of our servicemen, who were merely going about their jobs. Iran must be shown in no uncertain terms that this is not acceptable. Repeatedly asking nicely for their safe return is not the way to go about it.

I view this situation as similar to The Falklands. We have been provoked, and must respond.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
